skill.name: Unlocking the Technician
skill.normal: Unlocks the ability to place a trip mine.

skill.name: Rifleman
skill.normal: Your snap to zoom is 100% faster with assault rifles and sniper rifles.
skill.ace: Your weapon zoom level is increased by 25% with assault rifles and sniper rifles.

skill.name: Demolition Man
skill.normal: Adds 1 more trip mine to your inventory.
skill.ace: Decreases your trip mine deploy time by 20%.

skill.name: Nerves of Steel
skill.normal: You take 50% less damage while interacting with things.
skill.ace: You can now use steel sight while in bleedout.

skill.name: Sharpshooter
skill.normal: You are 20% more accurate with all single shot weapons.
skill.ace: Your weapon stability is increased with all rifles by 25%.

skill.name: Combat Engineer
skill.normal: Allows you to turn trip mines on or off.
skill.ace: Upgrades your trip mines with a sensor mode, highlighting enemies that walk past. During stealth, the trip mines will highlight guards and special enemies for you and your crew. If stealth is not an option, the trip mines will highlight special enemies for you and your crew.

skill.name: Hardware Expert
skill.normal: You fix the drill 25% faster and you also deploy trip mines 20% faster. (Can stack with Demolition Man Basic for 40% total reduced time).
skill.ace: Gives drill a 30% chance to autorestart when it breaks down. You also deploy the sentry gun 50% faster.

skill.name: Sentry gun
skill.normal: Unlocks the sentry gun for you to use.
skill.ace: Your sentry gun gains 150% more health.

skill.name: Tactical Mines
skill.normal: The radius of trip mine explosions are increased by 30%.
skill.ace: Special enemies marked by your trip mines take 15% more damage.

skill.name: Drill Sergeant
skill.normal: Your drilling efficiency is increased by 15%.
skill.ace: Further increases your drilling efficiency by 15%. (Stacks with Basic skill for 30% total increase to drill speed).

skill.name: Sentry Targeting Package
skill.normal: Your sentry gun's accuracy is improved by 100%.
skill.ace: Your sentry gun's rotational speed is increased by 150%. Your sentry gun is loaded with 50% extra ammo.

skill.name: Jack Of All Trades
skill.normal: The radius of trip mine explosions are increased by an additional 70%.
skill.ace: You can now carry sentry guns and trip mines at the same time. When you deplete your trip mines or sentry guns you will switch to the other one. Note: You need a sentry gun for this skill to work.

skill.name: Silent Drilling
skill.normal: Your drill makes 65% less noise. Civilians and guards are less likely to hear your drill and sound the alarm. (Reduces the sound radius to 9 meters).
skill.ace: Your drill is silent. Civilians and guards have to see the drill in order to sound the alarm.

skill.name: Sentry Combat Upgrade
skill.normal: You can reload the Sentry Gun using your own ammo.
skill.ace: Your sentry gun receives a protective shield.

skill.name: Shaped Charge
skill.normal: Adds 3 more trip mines to your inventory.
skill.ace: Trip mines can now be converted to shaped charges, used to breach certain safes and doors.

skill.name: Shockproof
skill.normal: Taser shock attacks on you backfire, knocking back the Taser.
skill.ace: Interacting with an enemy Taser while he is electrocuting you will electrocute him, dealing 50% damage to his health.

skill.name: Sentry Tower Defense
skill.normal: You can now place 2 sentry guns instead of just one
skill.ace: Your sentry gun damage is increased by 300%.

skill.name: Mag Plus
skill.normal: Your weapon magazine capacity is increased by 5 rounds.
skill.ace: Further increases your weapon magazine capacity by 10 rounds. Note: Does not apply to sniper rifles.

skill.name: Bulletproof
skill.normal: Improves your armor so you can absorb 50% more damage.
skill.ace: The armor recovery rate of you and your crew is increased by 25%.
